title: Help! My transaction is pending for 10 minutes
content: I sent XOM to another address 10 minutes ago and it's still showing as "pending". Is something wrong? The validator shows it's healthy.

title: Can I run a validator on my home computer?
content: I have a decent gaming PC that's on 24/7. Can I use it to run a validator and earn rewards? What are the requirements?

title: How does the referral bonus system work?
content: I want to refer friends to OmniBazaar. How much do we each earn and how does the two-level system work?

title: What is pXOM and when should I use it?
content: I see there's XOM and pXOM (private XOM). What's the difference and is there a reason to use privacy mode?

title: Why is there a 1% fee if it's peer-to-peer?
content: I thought peer-to-peer meant no fees? Why does OmniBazaar charge 1% on sales?

title: How do I stake XOM tokens?
content: I have 5,000 XOM and want to start earning staking rewards. What's the process and what returns can I expect?

title: Why are validator rewards decreasing?
content: I noticed block rewards went from 15.602 XOM to 15.445 XOM. Are rewards decreasing? How does this work?

title: Can I sell digital products on OmniBazaar?
content: I create digital art and want to sell downloads. Does OmniBazaar support digital products or is it only for physical items?

title: Security best practices for wallet?
content: What are the most important security steps I should take to protect my OmniWallet and crypto assets?

title: Welcome Bonus not received after verification?
content: I completed email and phone verification 2 days ago but haven't received my welcome bonus XOM yet. Is there a delay?

title: How do I swap XOM for AVAX?
content: I have some XOM tokens and want to convert them to AVAX. Do I use the DEX or the marketplace? What's the difference?

title: How do I list my first item for sale?
content: I just joined OmniBazaar and want to sell some items. Where do I start? Do I need XOM tokens to create a listing?

title: What happens if a buyer doesn't pay?
content: I sold an item 3 days ago and the buyer hasn't sent payment yet. What are my options? Can I cancel the sale?

title: What is Proof of Participation scoring?
content: I keep seeing references to "PoP score" and "participation score". What is this and why does it matter?

title: What blockchain is OmniCoin built on?
content: Is OmniCoin its own blockchain or does it run on Ethereum? I'm confused about the infrastructure.

title: How to increase my participation score quickly?
content: I want to become a listing node (need 25 points). I currently have 10 points. What's the fastest way to increase my PoP score?

title: How to handle a scam attempt?
content: Someone contacted me offering to "validate my wallet" and asking for my seed phrase. This is a scam, right? What should I do?

title: Can I import my existing wallet from MetaMask?
content: I already have a MetaMask wallet with some tokens. Can I use the same seed phrase in OmniWallet?

title: Best practices for shipping items internationally?
content: I've been selling locally but want to start shipping internationally. What should I know about customs, shipping costs, and international payments?

title: Difference between Market and Limit orders?
content: I'm new to DEX trading. When should I use a market order versus a limit order? What about stop-loss?

title: How does arbitration work for disputes?
content: I have a dispute with a buyer who claims the item arrived damaged (it didn't). How does the arbitration process work?
